survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Smart Thermostat Features Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from customers regarding their satisfaction with the features and usability of smart thermostats.

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your smart thermostat?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for better measurement of satisfaction levels. Ensure the scale is balanced and easy to understand.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Display all options vertically.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the overall performance of your smart thermostat?

questions.question_text: Which of the following smart thermostat features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections to accurately capture feature usage. Ensure 'None of the above' is included for respondents who may not use any features.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Multi-choice checkboxes. Display all options vertically.

script.question_text: Which of the following smart thermostat features do you use most frequently? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How easy was it to install and set up your smart thermostat?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure ease of installation. This helps identify potential pain points for customers.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Display all options vertically.

script.question_text: How easy was it to install and set up your smart thermostat?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your smart thermostat?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is large enough for detailed responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Open-text. Provide a text area for respondents to type their answers.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for your smart thermostat?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your smart thermostat to a friend or family member?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure Net Promoter Score (NPS). This is a key metric for customer loyalty.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Single-choice radio buttons. Display all options vertically.
